name: Bounce Bounce (DarkLightStudios)
description:
This is a small Hyper-Casual game that i made for Android and soon to be IOS, The Aim of the game is to bounce the ball has many time has you can before it touches the lava .

  

Use your Finger/hold mouse to move the paddle from side to side.

 

Programmer - Connor Swannell (Me)

Sounds - SomeGuy22 & iul_Paris8
